levels.description:
Passive Effect: A single Servant of Lamentation takes on a special form, which can only be upgraded using this skill (up to {attack@max_stack_cnt} times)
Active Effect: Immediately deals <@ba.vup>{attack@atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Arts damage to all enemies in range, then consumes a Servant of Lamentation to upgrade the special Servant and restore <@ba.vup>{attack@hp_ratio:0%}</> of its HP (doubled if consumed Servant is upgraded); repeats <@ba.vup>{attack@necras_s_3[attack_cnt].max_stack_cnt}</> times
